Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: John and Mercedes O'Hale and Frank and Phyllis Ward Scholarship
Description:: The John and Mercedes O'Hale and Frank and Phyllis Ward Scholarship is available to Carolina students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.   You must reside in the state of North Carolina to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Warren Seipp and Barbara Stockton Perry Scholarship
Description:: The Warren Seipp and Barbara Stockton Perry Scholarship is available to Carolina students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.   You must reside in the state of North Carolina and demonstrate academic record to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: The Honorable J. Dickson Phillips, Jr., Scholarship
Description:: The Honorable J. Dickson Phillips, Jr., Scholarship is available to Carolina students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.   You must demonstrate financial need to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: J. Will Pless, Sr., and Judge J. Will Pless, Jr., Scholarship
Description::
The J. Will Pless, Sr., and Judge J. Will Pless, Jr., Scholarship
 is available to Carolina students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.   You must be a resident of McDowell County, North Carolina, or a resident of western North Carolina, or a resident of North Carolina for at least five years, and demonstrate financial need to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Gregory Douglas, Daryl Geoffrey, Christopher Kelly Porter Chancellors Scholarship
Description:: The Gregory Douglas, Daryl Geoffrey, Christopher Kelly Porter Chancellors Scholarship is available to Carolina students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Augustus Barker Raymer Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The Augustus Barker Raymer Memorial Scholarship is available to Carolina students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.   You must demonstrate academic merit to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: The Honorable Robert D. Rouse, Jr., Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The Honorable Robert D. Rouse, Jr., Memorial Scholarship is available to Carolina students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.   You must demonstrate academic merit and financial need to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Braxton Schell Scholarship
Description:: The Braxton Schell Scholarship is available to Carolina students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.   You must demonstrate academic merit and financial need to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: A.A.F. Seawell Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The A.A.F. Seawell Memorial Scholarship is available to Carolina students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Donald L. Smith/Manila G. Shaver Scholarship
Description:: The A.A.F. Seawell Memorial Scholarship is available to Carolina students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must be a North Carolina resident, demonstrate financial need and promote the study of constitutional law to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Richard Y. Stevens Law School Scholarship
Description:: The Richard Y. Stevens Law School Scholarship is available to Carolina students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must be a North Carolina resident and demonstrate financial need with an expressed desire to practice law in the State of North Carolina upon graduation to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Kirby Sullivan Scholarship
Description:: The Kirby Sullivan Scholarship is available to Carolina students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.   You must demonstrate scholastic record and financial need to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: James Taylor Jr. Scholarship
Description:: The James Taylor Jr. Scholarship is available to Carolina students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.   You must be a North Carolina resident, demonstrate merit and financial need to be eligible fort his award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Helen Guerrant Watson Scholarship
Description:: The Helen Guerrant Watson Scholarship is available to Carolina students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.   You must demonstrate academic merit or financial need to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: The Honorable John Webb Scholarship
Description:: The Honorable John Webb Scholarship is available to Carolina students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.   You must demonstrate scholastic achievement and financial need, with special attention given to applicants with roots in North Carolina to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: Dirksen Congressional Center
title: Ray and Kathy LaHood Scholarship
Fields of Study:: Political Science, Public Administration, American Studies, History
Description:: The Ray and Kathy LaHood Scholarship is available to junior students at Bradley University.  You must be majoring in a field related to the study of the U.S. government and have a minimum 3.5 GPA to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: Eastern Michigan University
title: Charles B. Fulford Scholarship
Description:: The Charles B. Fulford Scholarship is available to undergraduate students who have been on academic probation at Eastern Michigan University.  You must have a minimum 2.5 GPA to be eligible for this award.  Preference is given to students enrolled in the individualized studies program.

Provided By:: Antelope Valley College
title: Beverly Ann Beyer Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The Beverly Ann Beyer Memorial Scholarship is available to students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have a minimum GPA of 3.0, have 24 or more "degree applicable" units completed, majoring in business and nursing to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: Antelope Valley College
title: Caleb Daniel Simpson Memorial Scholarship (Osher)
Description:: The Caleb Daniel Simpson Memorial Scholarship (Osher) is available to continuing students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have a minimum GPA of 3.5 and majoring in engineering to be eligible for this award.  Preference recipient who is involved in sports.

Provided By:: Antelope Valley College
title: Captain Daniel Elkins Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The Captain Daniel Elkins Memorial Scholarship is available to full-time students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have a minimum GPA of 2.5 and majoring in fire technology to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: Antelope Valley College
title: CJ Talton Davis Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The Captain Daniel Elkins Memorial Scholarship is available to continuing students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have a minimum GPA of 2.5, majoring in business and accounting to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: Antelope Valley College
title: David P. Cooley Memorial Scholarship
Fields of Study:: Math, Science, Engineering, Aeronautical, Aviation Technology
Description:: The David P. Cooley Memorial Scholarship is available to continuing full-time students at Antelope Valley College.  You must be transferring to a 4-year school, have a minimum GPA of 3.0, majoring in math, science, engineering, or aeronautical and aviation technology to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: Antelope Valley College
title: Dejavu “Pursue Your Dreams” Scholarship (Osher)
Description:: The Dejavu “Pursue Your Dreams” Scholarship (Osher) is available to continuing students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have completed 24 or more “degree applicable” units, receiving Board of Governors(BOG) Fee Waiver and have a minimum GPA of 2.5 to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: Antelope Valley College
title: Don and Irene Ross Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The Don and Irene Ross Memorial Scholarship is available to students at Antelope Valley College.  You must be transferring to a 4-year school, minimum GPA of 3.0 and involved in any area of music to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: Antelope Valley College
title: Donna R. Bailey Memorial Scholarship (Osher)
Description:: The Donna R. Bailey Memorial Scholarship (Osher) is available to continuing students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have completed 24 or more “degree applicable” units, receiving Board of Governors(BOG) Fee Waiver and have a minimum GPA of 2.5 to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: Antelope Valley College
title: Dr. Charles Lee, O.D. Memorial Scholarship - Palmdale West Kiwanis Club (Osher)
Description:: The Dr. Charles Lee, O.D. Memorial Scholarship - Palmdale West Kiwanis Club (Osher) is available to continuing students at Antelope Valley College.  You must have completed 24 or more “degree applicable” units, receiving Board of Governors(BOG) Fee Waiver, have a minimum GPA of 3.0 and majoring health sciences to be eligible for this award.
